::Ramulus/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::

Ramulus, Proto, and Smokescreen hold their fire, Ramulus walks forward.

"Why are all these bots here?" the cloaked bot asks.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer ignores Magnus' command, one of his missile launcher spinning around 
to fire at the bot.
